name: MetLife
bossPosition: Senior Vice President and Head of Legal for EMEA
goal: MetLife, Inc. (NYSE: MET), through its subsidiaries and affiliates (“MetLife”), is one of the world’s leading financial services companies, providing insurance, annuities, employee benefits and asset management to help its individual and institutional customers navigate their changing world. Founded in 1868, MetLife has operations in more than 40 countries and holds leading market positions in the United States, Japan, Latin America, Asia, Europe and the Middle East. For more information, visit www.metlife.com.
interests: Consumer Affairs, Economic and Financial Affairs, Employment and Social Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Internal Market, Trade
euInitiatives:
MetLife follows a wide range of relevant policy areas, including:
Prudential
Consumer Protection
Retirement & Savings
Trade
Capital Markets Union
Data Protection
FinTech/InsurTech
Sustainable Finance
